page.title: 11CUSTOMS,SAUNDERSFOOT
page.content: difficult for the person jumping. Eventually each child will put a foot wrong and be out. In Saundersfoot school playground there is a painted netball pitch and the boys have made up the following game called Line Touch.From a crowd one boy is selected as the catcher.In ten seconds all others must get away from him.Every boy must keep to the lines on the ground and when touched by the catcher then becomes the new catcher.The excitement mounts when groups of boys are caught together among the lines and cannot get away.
